name: Karen Putz
what_you_do: Karen Putz is a transformational speaker and life coach specializing in helping individuals unwrap their passions at any age. She is also the owner of The Passion School and a certified Passion Test Facilitator.
who_you_serve: Karen serves individuals seeking personal growth and passion discovery, including those in midlife and beyond, as well as audiences of all sizes.
signature_programs: Unwrapping Your Passion, Creating the Life You Truly Want, The Passionate Lives of Deaf and Hard of Hearing People, and several others.
bio: 17X author, featured in Ability magazine, MORE magazine, espnW, CNN, TODAY Show, and recipient of the Hot Momma Award for Sports, Wellness and Fitness.
business_focus: Karen Putz is a transformational speaker and life coach specializing in helping individuals unwrap their passions at any age. She is also the owner of The Passion School and a certified Passion Test Facilitator. (life coaching)

jv_history.partner_name: Karen Guth Interview with Ron Jones Mar 24 2014
jv_history.source_quote: Guth, of the English Teaching with Creativity ETC, blog, interviews Ron Jones on Passion and Love- the keys to ... former students, his writing, coaching, activism and family. A must see for teachers
